sqlMap.statement:
SELECT COUNT (*)
FROM CTRY_ORIG_RST C
WHERE C.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND C.CTRY_CD = #origCtryCd# AND ( (C.BILL_TO_CUST_CD = #billToCustCd# AND C.ASG_LOC_ROLE_LAYER_NUM = '1') OR (C.SELL_TO_CUST_CD = #sellToCustCd# AND C.ASG_LOC_ROLE_LAYER_NUM = '2') ) AND C.EZCANCELFLAG = '0'
AND ROWNUM <= 1
